display.name: Statspack AAS
display.description: History of Average Active Sessions (AAS) and Host (OS) Load. Shows CPU cores as boundary.
display.tooltip: History of Average Active Sessions (AAS) and Host (OS) Load

query.sql: SELECT TO_CHAR( sn.snap_time, 'dd.mm. hh24:mi' ) time , CASE nm.stat_name WHEN 'NUM_CPUS' THEN 'Log. CPUs' WHEN 'NUM_CPU_CORES' THEN 'CPU Cores' WHEN 'LOAD' THEN 'OS Load' ELSE nm.stat_name END AS stat_name , os.value , sn.snap_time FROM stats$osstat os , stats$osstatname nm , stats$snapshot sn WHERE os.osstat_id = nm.osstat_id AND nm.stat_name IN( 'NUM_CPUS', 'LOAD', 'NUM_CPU_CORES' ) AND sn.snap_id = os.snap_id AND sn.instance_number = ( SELECT instance_number FROM v$instance ) AND os.instance_number = sn.instance_number UNION ALL SELECT time , 'AAS' AS stat_name , value_diff / DECODE( time_diff, 0, NULL, time_diff ) / 24 / 3600 / 1000000 AS aas , snap_time FROM ( SELECT TO_CHAR( sn.snap_time, 'dd.mm. hh24:mi' ) time , ( tm.value - LAG( tm.value, 1 ) OVER( ORDER BY tm.snap_id ) ) AS value_diff , ( sn.snap_time - LAG( sn.snap_time, 1 ) OVER( ORDER BY sn.snap_id ) ) AS time_diff , sn.snap_time FROM stats$sys_time_model tm , stats$time_model_statname nm , stats$snapshot sn WHERE tm.stat_id = nm.stat_id AND nm.stat_name = 'DB time' AND sn.snap_id = tm.snap_id AND sn.instance_number = ( SELECT instance_number FROM v$instance ) AND tm.instance_number = sn.instance_number ) --WHERE value_diff >= 0 -- Avoid negative values after instance restart ORDER BY snap_time, stat_name

SELECT prev_t ||' - '|| SUBSTR( snap_time, -5 ) AS interval , stat_name , ROUND( dv / DECODE( dt, 0, NULL, dt ) / 24 / 3600 / 1000000, 2 ) aas FROM ( SELECT tm.snap_id , TO_CHAR( sn.snap_time, 'dd.mm. hh24:mi' ) snap_time , nm.stat_name --, tm.VALUE --, LAG( tm.value, 1 ) OVER( PARTITION BY tm.stat_id ORDER BY tm.snap_id ) prev_v , tm.value - LAG( tm.value, 1 ) OVER( PARTITION BY tm.stat_id ORDER BY tm.snap_id ) dv , LAG( sn.snap_time, 1 ) OVER( PARTITION BY tm.stat_id ORDER BY tm.snap_id ) prev_t , sn.snap_time - LAG( sn.snap_time, 1 ) OVER( PARTITION BY tm.stat_id ORDER BY tm.snap_id ) AS dt FROM STATS$TIME_MODEL_STATNAME nm , STATS$SYS_TIME_MODEL tm , STATS$SNAPSHOT sn WHERE tm.STAT_ID = nm.STAT_ID AND tm.SNAP_ID = sn.SNAP_ID AND sn.instance_number = ( SELECT instance_number FROM v$instance ) AND TRUNC( snap_time, 'mi' ) <= TO_DATE( :TIME, 'dd.mm. hh24:mi' ) ) WHERE snap_time = :TIME AND ROUND( dv / DECODE( dt, 0, NULL, dt ) / 24 / 3600 / 1000000, 2 ) > 0 ORDER BY aas DESC, stat_name

SELECT prev_t ||' - '|| SUBSTR( snap_time, -5 ) AS interval , event , ROUND( time_spent, 2 ) time_spent , total_waits , ROUND( time_spent / total_waits * 1000, 2 ) avg_wait_ms FROM ( SELECT snap_id , TO_CHAR( snap_time, 'dd.mm. hh24:mi' ) snap_time , event , (time_waited_micro - LAG( time_waited_micro, 1 ) OVER( PARTITION BY event ORDER BY snap_id )) / 1000000 AS time_spent , NULLIF(total_waits - LAG( total_waits, 1 ) OVER( PARTITION BY name ORDER BY snap_id ), 0) AS total_waits , TO_CHAR( LAG( snap_time, 1 ) OVER( PARTITION BY name ORDER BY snap_id ), 'dd.mm. hh24:mi' ) prev_t FROM stats$snapshot NATURAL JOIN stats$system_event NATURAL JOIN v$event_name WHERE wait_class# != 6 AND instance_number = ( SELECT instance_number FROM v$instance ) AND TRUNC( snap_time, 'mi' ) <= TO_DATE( :TIME, 'dd.mm. hh24:mi' )
UNION ALL
SELECT snap_id , TO_CHAR( snap_time, 'dd.mm. hh24:mi' ) snap_time , 'CPU used by this session' AS event , (value - LAG( value, 1 ) OVER( PARTITION BY name ORDER BY snap_id )) / 100 AS time_spent , NULL AS total_waits , TO_CHAR( LAG( snap_time, 1 ) OVER( PARTITION BY name ORDER BY snap_id ), 'dd.mm. hh24:mi' ) prev_t FROM stats$sysstat NATURAL JOIN stats$snapshot WHERE TRUNC( snap_time, 'mi' ) <= TO_DATE( :TIME, 'dd.mm. hh24:mi' ) AND name = 'CPU used by this session' AND instance_number = ( SELECT instance_number FROM v$instance ) ) WHERE snap_time = :TIME AND ROUND( time_spent, 2 ) > 0 ORDER BY time_spent DESC

select TO_CHAR( snap_time, 'dd.mm. hh24:mi' ) snap_time , sql_id , text_subset , ROUND(d_ela/1000000, 2) "Elapsed/s" , d_exe "Execs" , ROUND(d_ela/1000000/ NULLIF( d_exe, 0 ), 2) "Ela/Exe/s" , ROUND(d_cpu/1000000) "CPU/s" , d_buf "Buffer Gets" , ROUND(d_buf/NULLIF(d_exe, 0)) "Gets/Exec" , d_rds "Disk Reads" , ROUND(d_exe / NULLIF( dt, 0 ) / 24 / 3600, 2) "Execs/s" , module , snap_id -- needed as bin variable for child report , instance_number -- needed as bin variable for child report from ( SELECT sn.snap_time , sm.ELAPSED_TIME - LAG( sm.ELAPSED_TIME, 1, 0 ) OVER( PARTITION BY sm.sql_id ORDER BY sm.snap_id ) d_ela , sm.EXECUTIONS - LAG( sm.EXECUTIONS, 1, 0 ) OVER( PARTITION BY sm.sql_id ORDER BY sm.snap_id ) d_exe , sm.BUFFER_GETS - LAG( sm.BUFFER_GETS, 1, 0 ) OVER( PARTITION BY sm.sql_id ORDER BY sm.snap_id ) d_buf , sm.DISK_READS - LAG( sm.DISK_READS, 1, 0 ) OVER( PARTITION BY sm.sql_id ORDER BY sm.snap_id ) d_rds , sm.CPU_TIME - LAG( sm.CPU_TIME, 1, 0 ) OVER( PARTITION BY sm.sql_id ORDER BY sm.snap_id ) d_cpu , sn.snap_time - LAG( sn.snap_time, 1 ) OVER( PARTITION BY sm.sql_id ORDER BY sn.snap_id ) AS dt , sm.* FROM perfstat.stats$sql_summary sm , perfstat.STATS$SNAPSHOT sn WHERE sm.snap_id = sn.snap_id AND TRUNC( snap_time, 'mi' ) <= TO_DATE( :TIME, 'dd.mm. hh24:mi' ) AND sn.instance_number = ( SELECT instance_number FROM v$instance ) AND sm.instance_number = sn.instance_number ) WHERE TO_CHAR( snap_time, 'dd.mm. hh24:mi' ) = :TIME ORDER BY d_ela DESC
select SQL_TEXT from perfstat.STATS$SQLTEXT where sql_id=:SQL_ID order by piece

select lpad(' ',1*(depth-1))||operation||' '||options "Operation" , CASE WHEN id=0 THEN 'PHV: '||to_char(plan_hash_value) WHEN REGEXP_SUBSTR(object_type, '[[:alpha:]\_]+\S') IN ('TABLE', 'VIEW', 'INDEX', 'PROCEDURE', 'FUNCTION', 'MAT_VIEW', 'CLUSTER') THEN 'SQLDEV:LINK:' ||object_owner ||':' ||REGEXP_SUBSTR( DECODE( object_type, 'CLUSTER', 'TABLE', object_type ), '[[:alpha:]\_]+\S') ||':' ||REGEXP_SUBSTR(object_name, '[[:alnum:]\_\$]+\S') ||':oracle.dbtools.raptor.controls.grid.DefaultDrillLink' ELSE object_name END AS "Object" , lpad(decode(cardinality,null,' ', decode(sign(cardinality-1000), -1, cardinality||' ', decode(sign(cardinality-1000000), -1, trunc(cardinality/1000)||'K', decode(sign(cardinality-1000000000), -1, trunc(cardinality/1000000)||'M', trunc(cardinality/1000000000)||'G')))), 6, ' ') AS "Rows" , lpad(decode(bytes,null,' ', decode(sign(bytes-1024), -1, bytes||' ', decode(sign(bytes-1048576), -1, trunc(bytes/1024)||'K', decode(sign(bytes-1073741824), -1, trunc(bytes/1048576)||'M', trunc(bytes/1073741824)||'G')))), 6, ' ') AS "Bytes" , COST , IO_COST , lpad(decode(CPU_COST,null,' ', decode(sign(CPU_COST-1000), -1, CPU_COST||' ', decode(sign(CPU_COST-1000000), -1, trunc(CPU_COST/1000)||'K', decode(sign(CPU_COST-1000000000), -1, trunc(CPU_COST/1000000)||'M', trunc(CPU_COST/1000000000)||'G')))), 6, ' ') AS "CPU_COST" , QBLOCK_NAME , OTHER_TAG , PARTITION_START , PARTITION_STOP , ACCESS_PREDICATES , FILTER_PREDICATES , PROJECTION from stats$sql_plan where plan_hash_value in (select plan_hash_value from stats$sql_plan_usage spu where spu.sql_id = :SQL_ID and spu.plan_hash_value > 0 ) order by plan_hash_value, id

select * from ( select TO_CHAR( snap_time, 'dd.mm. hh24:mi' ) SNAP_TIME, 'SQLDEV:LINK:' ||owner ||':' ||object_type ||':' ||object_name ||':oracle.dbtools.raptor.controls.grid.DefaultDrillLink' AS "Link" , OWNER, OBJECT_NAME, OBJECT_TYPE, TABLESPACE_NAME , LOGICAL_READS - LAG( LOGICAL_READS, 1 ) OVER( PARTITION BY obj# ORDER BY snap_id ) LOGICAL_RDS , DB_BLOCK_CHANGES - LAG( DB_BLOCK_CHANGES, 1 ) OVER( PARTITION BY obj# ORDER BY snap_id ) DB_BLOCK_CHANGES , PHYSICAL_READS - LAG( PHYSICAL_READS, 1 ) OVER( PARTITION BY obj# ORDER BY snap_id ) PHYSICAL_READS , PHYSICAL_WRITES - LAG( PHYSICAL_WRITES, 1 ) OVER( PARTITION BY obj# ORDER BY snap_id ) PHYSICAL_WRITES , BUFFER_BUSY_WAITS - LAG( BUFFER_BUSY_WAITS, 1 ) OVER( PARTITION BY obj# ORDER BY snap_id ) BUFFER_BUSY_WAITS , DIRECT_PHYSICAL_READS - LAG( DIRECT_PHYSICAL_READS, 1 ) OVER( PARTITION BY obj# ORDER BY snap_id ) DIRECT_PHYSICAL_READS , DIRECT_PHYSICAL_WRITES - LAG( DIRECT_PHYSICAL_WRITES, 1 ) OVER( PARTITION BY obj# ORDER BY snap_id ) DIRECT_PHYSICAL_WRITES , GC_CR_BLOCKS_RECEIVED - LAG( GC_CR_BLOCKS_RECEIVED, 1 ) OVER( PARTITION BY obj# ORDER BY snap_id ) GC_CR_BLOCKS_RECEIVED , GC_CURRENT_BLOCKS_RECEIVED - LAG( GC_CURRENT_BLOCKS_RECEIVED, 1 ) OVER( PARTITION BY obj# ORDER BY snap_id ) GC_CURRENT_BLOCKS_RECEIVED , GC_BUFFER_BUSY - LAG( GC_BUFFER_BUSY, 1 ) OVER( PARTITION BY obj# ORDER BY snap_id ) GC_BUFFER_BUSY , ITL_WAITS - LAG( ITL_WAITS, 1 ) OVER( PARTITION BY obj# ORDER BY snap_id ) ITL_WAITS , ROW_LOCK_WAITS - LAG( ROW_LOCK_WAITS, 1 ) OVER( PARTITION BY obj# ORDER BY snap_id ) ROW_LOCK_WAITS , GLOBAL_CACHE_CR_BLOCKS_SERVED - LAG( GLOBAL_CACHE_CR_BLOCKS_SERVED, 1 ) OVER( PARTITION BY obj# ORDER BY snap_id ) GLOBAL_CACHE_CR_BLOCKS_SERVED , GLOBAL_CACHE_CU_BLOCKS_SERVED - LAG( GLOBAL_CACHE_CU_BLOCKS_SERVED, 1 ) OVER( PARTITION BY obj# ORDER BY snap_id ) GLOBAL_CACHE_CU_BLOCKS_SERVED from PERFSTAT.STATS$SNAPSHOT sn natural join PERFSTAT.STATS$SEG_STAT ss natural join PERFSTAT.STATS$SEG_STAT_OBJ so where TO_CHAR( snap_time, 'dd.mm. hh24:mi' ) <= :TIME AND instance_number = ( SELECT instance_number FROM v$instance )
) where snap_time = :TIME and LOGICAL_RDS is not null order by LOGICAL_RDS desc nulls last
